item.title: Personal Library
item.description:
Library

A curated collection of books I’ve read, am reading, or plan to read. This list reflects my interests in philosophy, classical literature, and historical works.

Contents

  • Ancient Philosophy
  • Modern Philosophy
  • Historical Works
  • Eastern Thought
  • Classical Literature
  • Military & Political Theory
  • Language & Reference

Ancient Philosophy

  • Republic - Plato
    • Core work on justice, education, and the ideal state
  • Timaeus - Plato
    • Dialogue on cosmology and the physical world
  • Symposium and the Death of Socrates - Plato
    • Collection including Euthyphro, Apology, Crito, and Phaedo
  • The Metaphysics - Aristotle
    • Foundational work on being and first principles
  • Letters - Pliny the Younger
    • Firsthand account of Roman life and governance
  • Enneads - Plotinus
    • Neo-Platonic treatises on the soul, being, and the One

Modern Philosophy

  • Critique of Pure Reason - Immanuel Kant
  • Thus Spake Zarathustra - Friedrich Nietzsche
  • Beyond Good and Evil - Friedrich Nietzsche
  • Aphorisms on Love and Hate - Friedrich Nietzsche
  • On the Suffering of the World - Arthur Schopenhauer
  • Ethics - Benedict Spinoza
  • Le mythe de Sisyphe - Albert Camus
  • The Ego and Its Own - Max Stirner

Historical Works

  • The Histories - Herodotus
    • The foundation of historical writing
  • SPQR - Mary Beard
    • Modern perspective on Roman history
  • Emperor of Rome - Mary Beard
  • The Decline and Fall of the Roman Empire - Edward Gibbon
    • Classic work on Roman decline
  • The First Crusade - Peter Frankopan
  • The New Silk Roads - Peter Frankopan
  • The Last Days of the Ottoman Empire - Ryan Gingeras
  • Greek and Roman Political Ideas - Melissa Lane

Eastern Thought

  • Tao Te Ching - Lao Tzu
    • Foundational Taoist text
  • The Upanishads
    • Core Vedic philosophical texts
  • The Sacred Gathas of Zarathustra & The Old Avestan Canon - Pablo Vazquez
  • Ibn Fadlan and the Land of Darkness - Ibn Fadlan
    • Travel accounts through medieval Islamic lands

Classical Literature

  • The Fall of Icarus - Ovid
  • O Cruel Alexis - Virgil
  • Inferno - Dante Alighieri
  • Faust - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
  • Caligula - Suetonius
  • The Concise Pepys - Samuel Pepys

Military & Political Theory

  • The Prince - Machiavelli
    • Classic work on political power
  • On War - Carl von Clausewitz
    • Comprehensive theory of warfare
  • The Book of Five Rings - Miyamoto Musashi
    • Japanese martial and strategic philosophy

Language & Reference

    • Comprehensive Latin grammar
